渧字的基本解释

渧
tí
古同“啼”，啼哭。

渧
dī
古同“滴”。

渧
dì
水慢慢渗下。
精液。

渧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dì］
［《廣韻》都計切，去霽，端。］
精液。佛教称女精为赤渧，男精为白渧。
[②]［dī］
［《字彙》丁計切］
同“滴1”。
[③]［tí］
［《集韻》田黎切，平齊，定。］
同“嗁1”。
啼哭。

渧字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　渧； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页634第08
【廣韻】都計切【集韻】丁計切，?音帝。【埤蒼】?漉也。一曰滴水。【說文】本作?。【梵書】省作渧。【地藏經】一毛一渧，一沙一塵。　又【集韻】田黎切，音題。與啼同。號也。

渧字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
渧字的起名意思

暂无。

渧
Basic explanation of words
渧
tí
Gu Tong "cries" and cries.
渧
dī
Gu Tong "di".
渧
dì
The water seeps slowly.
semen.
渧
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dì］
["Guangyun" all plan to cut, go to Ji, end. ]
semen. Buddhism calls the female spirit Chili, and the male spirit is Baili.
[②]［dī］
["Zihui" Ding Jiqie]
Same as "drop 1".
[③]［tí］
["Jiyun" Tian Liqie, level, set. ]
Same as "嗁1".
cry.
渧
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Water Word Department】　渧; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 634 08
[Guangyun] All Jiqie 【Jiyun】Ding Jiqie, the emperor of music. [Picang]? Yan Ye. One said dripping water. [Said the text] This work?. 【Sanskrit Book】Province Zuolu. 【The Buddhist scriptures of the Ksitigarbha】a dime and a lumber, a sand and a dust.　[Jiyun] Tian Liqie, phonetic title. Same with cry. No. also.
